name: Symploké: La Leyenda de Gustavo Bueno (Capítulo 2)
name_original: Symploké: La Leyenda de Gustavo Bueno (Capítulo 2)
description:
Fermin Games, a new spanish company of videogames, now presents the second chapter of "Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno", the most compelling -and first- philosophical adventure ever made.

Who already played the first episode, also available in Steam, got into the skin of Benito Retamosa -a lazy, cheeky student, more interested in partying than in reading Aristotle. Therefore, this game is the next challenge to overcome only for those daring players who managed to successfully complete the previous part.
For this reason, the player will be required to enter the PASSWORD obtained at the end of the first episode of "Symploké".

All texts in game are translated into English but the spanish voices have been left as they were, to provide the player with an atmosphere as close as possible to the original version. Soundtrack is funny as well and all graphics have been designed with Microsoft Paint. What else do you need to be told to download this work and immerse yourself in the magical world of a engagingly roguish hero?
